Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client whose logo is displayed in the carousel.

Skill.title: Skill

ContactMessage.description: Represents a message submitted through the contact form.

PremiumLink.title: PremiumLink
PremiumLink.description: Represents a unique link that grants access to one or more courses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the link (the token).

name.description: A descriptive name for the link, for admin use.

courseIds.description: An array of course IDs that this link grants access to.

AuditLog.title: AuditLog
AuditLog.description: Represents a log entry for an action performed by an administrator.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

adminId.description: The UID of the administrator who performed the action.

action.description: A description of the action performed (e.g., 'course_created', 'module_updated').

entityType.description: The type of entity that was affected (e.g., 'course', 'user', 'module').

entityId.description: The ID of the entity that was affected.

entityTitle.description: The title or name of the entity for easy identification.

Progress.title: Progress
Progress.description: Tracks a user's progress in a specific course.

courseId.description: The ID of the course this progress pertains to.

completedLessons.description: A map where keys are lesson IDs and values are timestamps of completion.

updatedAt.description: The last time progress was updated.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to store data for the 'Portf√≥lio Hades' application, focusing on separation of concerns, security, and scalability. User management has been added with a specific subcollection for course access to allow granular control. The `premiumLinks` collection has been added to manage the new premium access system, linking tokens to course bundles.

**Users:** Stored in the `/users` collection.
**Course Access:** A subcollection `/users/{userId}/courseAccess` explicitly grants users access to courses.
**Premium Links:** A new collection `/premiumLinks` stores the generated tokens and the course IDs they grant access to.
**Audit Logs:** A new collection `/auditLogs` has been added to track all administrative actions for security and monitoring purposes.
**Progress:** A new subcollection `/users/{userId}/progress` tracks user completion of lessons within each course, enabling progress bars and detailed admin views.
